thread.title: 8 Valentine's Day looks to fall in love with
thread.title_full: 8 Valentine's Day looks to fall in love with

title: 8 Valentine's Day looks to fall in love with
text: Paul Ramos Blog: www.thestylechoreo.blogspot.com This is no ordinary formal look! The sleek pinstripe single-breasted blazer goes impeccably well with the black trousers and Paul finishes the look with croc tassel loafers and a black bow tie. "For a touch of romance, add a red flower lapel pin," advises Paul. "It's just perfect for the occasion." Blazer, pants & bow tie: ZaraLoafers: Bachelor Shoes Suit: Bespoke, stitched in ThailandShoes: Paul Evans NYWatch: Antoni ManuelPocket square: Bowties & Don't want a traditional pink or red dress? Get creative with a crop top, full skirt and red accessories like Archana did with this look. "This looks great, even if you just want to spend the day with your girlfriends," she says. Skirt: River Island Heels : Call It Spring "This is the perfect evening look for those who want to go out and celebrate their unique love story," says Nicoleta. A classic red jumpsuit looks edgy, yet elegant and is perfect when paired with high heels.
